title: Shares of key chip suppliers jump as U.S. reportedly considers toned-down China curbs
content: ASML and Tokyo Electron shares rose after a report that the U.S. is considering sanctions on China's chip industry that stop short of earlier proposals.
summary: ASML and Tokyo Electron shares rose after a report that the U.S. is considering sanctions on China's chip industry that stop short of earlier proposals.

title: Chinese yuan to hit record lows as U.S. tariff threat mounts, investment banks forecast
content: Major investment banks and research firms project offshore yuan to weaken to an average 7.51 per dollar through the end of 2025, the weakest level on record.

title: OPEC+ postpones meeting to decide oil production strategy to Dec. 5, sources say
